QuestData.Title: To Take the Barracks
QuestData.Description: One of the key fortifications within Tyr's Hand is the barracks, which lies right next to this flare. The Brotherhood of Light and their centurions will need all the help they can get in sacking it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Crusade Commander Korfax in front of the Barracks at Tyr's Hand in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: I'll be handling things from here, $c.$b$bFine, you want an assignment? I suppose I can afford to send you in on a mission or two.
